text: The 2008 Georgia Southern Eagles team represented Georgia Southern University in the 2008 NCAA Division I FCS football season. The Eagles were led by second year head coach Chris Hatcher and played their home games at Paulson Stadium. They are a member of the Southern Conference. They finished the season 6–5, 4–4 in Southern Conference play. ==Schedule== ==References== Georgia Southern Category:Georgia Southern Eagles football seasons Georgia Southern Eagles football
title: 2008 Georgia Southern Eagles football team
